flow.descriptionCdata:
754d194f-4da0-4585-bb86-12d753e5b4c2.0c09780a-bd03-4595-b3f7-d9dee5e071c1.description=Allows a user to select how they should be notified of the outcome of a flow, and shows them a message in that way. Inputs\: notifydata - The message to notify the user of. notifyMethod - The method of notification (file, email, display). subject - This is a description of what the notification is about. destination - for files, the file to write to, for emails the email to send to. notificationServer - If the specified method send the notifydata to a server, this is the name of the server to notify (i.e. an email server) from - This is the originator of the message (email from address). sourceServer - Some integrations use a multi-level server architecture for processing tickets, this is the name of a mid-tier server in such an architecture. serverPort - The port the service to notify on the server is running on. username - A username to use when authenticating to a notification method requiring authentication. password - The password for username. Responses\: success - The user was notified. failure - Notification failed. 754d194f-4da0-4585-bb86-12d753e5b4c2.0ddb8a37-8f96-4844-9549-349234bf8ecb.prompt=Notification Method\: 754d194f-4da0-4585-bb86-12d753e5b4c2.10f1b35c-4afb-42c6-a0cc-8b16cf752f6d.description=Allows a user to select how they should be notified of the outcome of a flow, and shows them a message in that way. Inputs\: notifydata - The message to notify the user of. notifyMethod - The method of notification (file, email, display). subject - This is a description of what the notification is about. destination - for files, the file to write to, for emails the email to send to. notificationServer - If the specified method send the notifydata to a server, this is the name of the server to notify (i.e. an email server) from - This is the originator of the message (email from address). sourceServer - Some integrations use a multi-level server architecture for processing tickets, this is the name of a mid-tier server in such an architecture. serverPort - The port the service to notify on the server is running on. username - A username to use when authenticating to a notification method requiring authentication. password - The password for username. Responses\: success - The user was notified. failure - Notification failed. 754d194f-4da0-4585-bb86-12d753e5b4c2.4289eeb3-b996-4e23-baab-c36cce4eacf8.prompt=Notification option\: 754d194f-4da0-4585-bb86-12d753e5b4c2.be0cacdb-6940-43db-be56-9716df45e9d1.prompt=Notification option\: 754d194f-4da0-4585-bb86-12d753e5b4c2.bff5562c-2257-4706-8aba-defaa6237c5b.prompt=Notification option\: 754d194f-4da0-4585-bb86-12d753e5b4c2.c6642a0f-a088-437c-9846-288f2dffd7b3.description=Generates an html table from a list of data. Inputs\: tableData - The list to generate the table from. columnDelimiter - A delimiter that separates columns in the tableData. rowDelimiter - A delimiter that separates the rows in tableData. Returns\: An html formatted table. Responses\: success - The operation was successful. failure - Something went wrong. 754d194f-4da0-4585-bb86-12d753e5b4c2.description=
Finds all users who have not logged in recently.

Inputs\:
    host - A domain controller to enumerate all domain controllers from
    DN - The Distinguished Name of the Organization Unit containing the users to be reviewed
    username - Username to use for LDAP queries
    password - Password to use for LDAP queries
    daysOld - The maximum number of days passed since the user logged in, in order to still be considered active
    notifyMethod - How to notify the user of the results of the flow

Responses\:
    success - No inactive users were found
    diagnosed - Inactive users were found
    failure - The operation completed unsuccessfully

Results\: 
    Displays a summary of the flow's results
754d194f-4da0-4585-bb86-12d753e5b4c2.f1032d50-ed50-455e-b485-76785e248938.description=Allows a user to select how they should be notified of the outcome of a flow, and shows them a message in that way. Inputs\: notifydata - The message to notify the user of. notifyMethod - The method of notification (file, email, display). subject - This is a description of what the notification is about. destination - for files, the file to write to, for emails the email to send to. notificationServer - If the specified method send the notifydata to a server, this is the name of the server to notify (i.e. an email server) from - This is the originator of the message (email from address). sourceServer - Some integrations use a multi-level server architecture for processing tickets, this is the name of a mid-tier server in such an architecture. serverPort - The port the service to notify on the server is running on. username - A username to use when authenticating to a notification method requiring authentication. password - The password for username. Responses\: success - The user was notified. failure - Notification failed. 754d194f-4da0-4585-bb86-12d753e5b4c2.fc0122fe-2583-486d-8f0c-17f6b8c5858a.description=
gets the DN of the root domain in active directory.

Inputs\:
host - An active directory domain controller.
altuser - The user to authenticate to host as.
altpassword - The password for altuser.

Responses\:
success - DN retrieved successfully.
failure - Unable to retrieve DN.
flow.name: Find Inactive Users

staticBinding.value: The flow 'Find Inactive Users' Attempted to run, but an unknown error occurred.
